response.overview: Heartbroken by the devastation just west of Nashville in Dickson and Humphreys Counties, the latter of which country music icon Loretta Lynn calls home, the coal miner’s daughter quickly jumped into action to support her community with a benefit concert. Loretta Lynn’s Friends: Hometown Rising benefit concert features performances by BRELAND, Garth Brooks & Trisha Yearwood, Luke Bryan, Luke Combs, Chris Janson, Little Big Town, Reba McEntire, Brittney Spencer, & Keith Urban live-streamed from the Opry House with proceeds benefitting the United Way of Humphreys County.
response.title: Loretta Lynn's Friends: Hometown Rising
